blocks.name: fprod
blocks.content: The value of a product over a nonempty finite set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: prodfc
blocks.content: A lemma to facilitate conversions from the function form to the class-variable form of a product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm prodfc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))), cprod(s1, c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))), cprod(s1, c0, c1), cprod(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1))), cprod(s1, c0, cfv(cid, c1)))
  prodeq2i(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(cid, c1))
  fvmpt2i(s1, c0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)))
  nffvmpt1(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  prod2id(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

  ⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0,((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0))= prod(s1 ∈ c0, c1)

  3eqtr4a(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s1, c2, c3), cprod(s0, emptycls, c1), nat1, wa(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  prod0(s0, c1)
  prodeq1d(s0, c0, c1, emptycls, wa(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wfo(c5, emptycls, c0))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls)), wfo(c5, emptycls, c0), wf1o(c5, emptycls, c0))

blocks.name: prodss
blocks.content: Change the index set to a subset in an upper integer product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: fprodser
blocks.content: A finite product expressed in terms of a partial product of an infinite sequence. The recursive definition of a finite product follows from here. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)

  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(nat1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, w0, wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  eqeltrd(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2, nat1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), nat1))
  syl6eq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), nat1, cprod(s0, emptycls, c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  prodeq1(s0, c0, emptycls, c1)
  prod0(s0, c1)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(nat1, c2))
  fprodcl2lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c2, cc))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c2))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cfn))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s1, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s2, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fprodcllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s2 ∈ c2))→(s1[×]s2)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → 1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, w0, prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ c2)
  eqeltrd(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, nat1, (w0 ∧ c0 = ∅))
  adantl(w0, c0 = ∅, prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= 1)
  syl6eq(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1), nat1, prod(s0 ∈ ∅, c1), c0 = ∅)
  prodeq1(s0, c0, emptycls, c1)
  prod0(s0, c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 = ∅, 1 ∈ c2)
  fprodcl2lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, (s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s2 ∈ c2), (s1[×]s2)∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, c0 ∈ Fin)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s1, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s2, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: fprodcllemf
blocks.content: Finite product closure lemma. A version of ~ fprodcllem using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodcllemf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(nat1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

thm fprodcllemf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s2 ∈ c2))→(s1[×]s2)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → 1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {

  mpan9(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈ c2)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)
  rspsbc(s0, hs0, c0, c1 ∈ c2)
  elv(hs0, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c2 ↔[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c2))

blocks.name: fprodreclf
blocks.content: Closure of a finite product of real numbers. A version of ~ fprodrecl using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

thm fprodreclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))

} = {
  fprodcllemf(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cr, cc))
  ax-resscn()
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cr))
  remulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  1red(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

thm fprodreclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)

blocks.content: The quotient of two finite products. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: prodsn
blocks.content: A product of a singleton is the term. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)

  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(nat1, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(nat1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(nat1)
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(nat1, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
}

blocks.name: fprod1
blocks.content: A finite product of only one term is the term itself. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprod1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cprod(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), c1, cprod(s0, csn(c0), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(cprod(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), cprod(s0, csn(c0), c2)))
  prodeq1d(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2, csn(c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  fzsn(c0)
  prodsn(s0, c0, cz, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fprod1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)→ prod(s0 ∈(c0[...]c0), c2)= c1)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c2 = c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(prod(s0 ∈(c0[...]c0), c2), c1, prod(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℂ, prod(s0 ∈(c0[...]c0), c2)= prod(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2))
  prodeq1d(s0, (c0[...]c0), c2, { c0 }, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  fzsn(c0)
  prodsn(s0, c0, cz, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(c0)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(c0)), wcel(nat1, cz))

  f1osng(nat1, cz, c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(c0)), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csn(nat1), csn(c0))), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(nat1)))
  f1oeq2(co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(nat1), csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csn(c0))
  eqeltrd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), cc, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0))))
  sylan2b(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  sylan9eqr(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2, csb(s0, c0, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c3)
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)))
  sylan2b(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(nat1)))
  eleq2i(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(nat1))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(nat1)), wcel(nat1, cz))
  fzsn(nat1)
  velsn(hs1, nat1)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), c3)))
  3eqtr4rd(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), c3), csb(s0, c0, c3), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))

  csbiegf(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2)

  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), c0))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), c0), wcel(nat1, cz))
  fvsng(nat1, cz, c0, c1)
  eqeq12d(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3), cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), nat1, csn(cop(nat1, c2)))
  csbeq1d(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), nat1, csn(cop(nat1, c0)))
  seq1i(nat1, cmul, csn(cop(nat1, c2)), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1), c2), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(c2, cc))
  1z()
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc))
  fvsng(nat1, cz, c2, cc)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(nat1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(nat1, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(c0))

  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(nat1, c2)))

  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(nat1, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))

blocks.name: fprodsplit
blocks.content: Split a finite product into two parts. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1)), co(cprod(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), cmul, cprod(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), cprod(s0, c0, co(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), w0)
  oveq12d(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1), cprod(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), cprod(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), w0)
  syl5eqr(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cprod(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), cprod(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), w0)
  prodeq2i(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), c1)
  fprodss(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cc, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c2)), wceq(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), nat1))
  iffalsed(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  syl5eqr(cprod(s0, c3, c1), cprod(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), cprod(s0, c3, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), w0)
  prodeq2i(s0, c3, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c1)
  fprodss(s0, c3, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)), wceq(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), nat1))
  iffalsed(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c0, c3)
  fprodmul(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), w0)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  prodeq2dv(s0, c0, co(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syl6bb(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cun(c2, c3)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  elun(cv(s0), c2, c3)
  jaodan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(co(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1))
  eqtrd(co(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, co(c1, cmul, nat1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  oveq12d(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c1, nat1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  iffalsed(c1, nat1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  mulid1d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c2, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c2, c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  ssun1(c2, c3)
  eqtrd(co(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, co(nat1, cmul, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  oveq12d(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cmul, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), nat1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  iffalsed(c1, nat1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  con2d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  disjel(c2, c3, cv(s0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, nat1, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  mulid2d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c3, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  ssun2(c3, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fprodsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=(prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1)[×]prod(s0 ∈ c3, c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(c2 ⋃ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1)[×]prod(s0 ∈ c3, c1)), (prod(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1))[×]prod(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1))), prod(s0 ∈ c0,(if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)[×]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1))), w0)
  oveq12d(prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1), cmul, prod(s0 ∈ c3, c1), prod(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)), prod(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1)), w0)
  syl5eqr(prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1), prod(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)), prod(s0 ∈ c2, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)), w0)
  prodeq2i(s0, c2, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1), c1)
  fprodss(s0, c2, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1), cc, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 \ c2), if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)= 1)
  iffalsed(c1, nat1, s0 ∈(c0 \ c2), s0 ∈ c2)
  eldifn(s0, c0, c2)
  syl5eqr(prod(s0 ∈ c3, c1), prod(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1)), prod(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1)), w0)
  prodeq2i(s0, c3, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1), c1)
  fprodss(s0, c3, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1), cc, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 \ c3), if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1)= 1)
  iffalsed(c1, nat1, s0 ∈(c0 \ c3), s0 ∈ c3)
  eldifn(s0, c0, c3)
  fprodmul(s0, c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1), if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1), w0)
  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat1, s0 ∈ c2)
  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1)∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat1, s0 ∈ c3)
  prodeq2dv(s0, c0, (if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)[×]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1)), c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 1)[×]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 1))= c1, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈ c3))
  biimpa(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈ c3))
  syl6bb(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈ c3), s0 ∈(c2 ⋃ c3))
  eleq2d(s0, c0, (c2 ⋃ c3), w0)
  elun(s0, c2, c3)

thm fprodp1s(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈(c0[...](c1[+]1)), c2)=(prod(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)[×][(c1[+]1)/ s0]c2))

} = {

thm prodsns(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

thm fprodfac(setvar s0, class c0) {

  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(cfv(cfa, c0), cprod(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0))))

  facnn(c0)

  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wceq(cfv(cid, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  vex(s0)
  fvi(cv(s0), universe)

  3eqtr4a(cfv(cfa, c0), cprod(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), nat1, cprod(s0, emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  eqcomi(nat1, cprod(s0, emptycls, cv(s0)))
  prod0(s0, cv(s0))
  syl6eq(cfv(cfa, c0), nat1, cfv(cfa, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))

blocks.name: fprodeq0
blocks.content: Anything finite product containing a zero term is itself zero. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fprodshft
blocks.content: Shift the index of a finite product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodshft(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), cprod(s1, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3)), wceq(c2, c4))

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodf1o(s0, s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), c4, co(cv(s1), cmin, c3), cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), w0)
  fzfid(co(c0, caddc, c3), co(c1, caddc, c3), w0)
  mptfzshft(s0, c0, c3, c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3)))

thm fprodshft(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)= prod(s1 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[-]c3)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodf1o(s0, s1, (c0[...]c1), c2, ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), c4, (s1[-]c3), (s0 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))↦(s0[-]c3)), w0)
  fzfid((c0[+]c3), (c1[+]c3), w0)
  mptfzshft(s0, c0, c3, c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), ((s0 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))↦(s0[-]c3))` s1)=(s1[-]c3))
  fvmpt(s0, s1, ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), (s0 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))↦(s0[-]c3)), (s1[-]c3), (s0[-]c3))
  oveq1(s0, s1, cmin, c3)
  eqid((s0 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))↦(s0[-]c3)))
  ovex(s1, cmin, c3)

  diff.co.s(s0, s1, cmin, c3)

  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→ c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ s2 ∈ s1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s1 ⋃ { s2 })⊆ c3)
  ⊣ (w1 ↔ prod(s0 ∈ s1, prod(s3 ∈ c0, c1))= prod(s4 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ s1,({ s0 } × c0)), c2))

blocks.name: fprod2d
blocks.content: Write a double product as a product over a two-dimensional region. Compare ~ fsum2d . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fprodxp
blocks.content: Combine two products into a single product over the cartesian product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3), cprod(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), w0)
  fprod2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  prodeq1i(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3, cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, csn(cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(prod(s0 ∈ c0, prod(s1 ∈ c1, c2)), prod(s2 ∈(c0 × c1), c3), prod(s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), c3), w0)
  fprod2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  prodeq1i(s2, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), c3, (c0 × c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, ({ s0 } × c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, { s0 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fprodcnv
blocks.content: Transform a product region using the converse operation. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Feb-2018.)

thm fprodcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s1, ccnv(c0), c2)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cop(cv(s3), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))

  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6eqr(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s1, ccnv(c0), c2), cprod(s1, ccnv(c0), csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3))), w0)
  fprodf1o(s0, s1, c0, c1, ccnv(c0), csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), w0)
  syl6eqr(c1, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  csbeq1a(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1)
  csbie2(s2, s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3, csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1))
  syl5eqr(c3, csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1), csb(s0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  csbie(s0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1, c3)
  opex(cv(s2), cv(s3))
  csbeq1d(s0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  opeq12(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(ccnv(c0), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  cnvfi(c0)
  mpbii(w0, wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), c0), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  ax-mp(wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  cnvf1o(hs0, ccnv(c0))
  f1oeq3d(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0, w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  dfrel2(c0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  eqtrd(cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  fveq2d(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), ccnv(c0)))

  eleq1d(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  fvmpt(hs0, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), ccnv(c0), cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eq(cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  unieqd(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))), ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  cnveqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  sneq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))
  opswap(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))))
  opex(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  prodeq2i(s1, ccnv(c0), c2, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)))
  syl6eqr(c2, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(c2, csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  1st2nd(ccnv(c0), cv(s1))
  csbeq1a(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)
  csbie2(s2, s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3, csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2))
  fvex(c2nd, cv(s1))
  fvex(c1st, cv(s1))
  syl5eqr(c3, csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2), csb(s1, cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), c2), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  csbie(s1, cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), c2, c3)
  opex(cv(s3), cv(s2))
  csbeq1d(s1, cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), c2, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  ancoms(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wceq(cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  opeq12(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  diff.csb.s(s0, s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3))

  diff.cop.s(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  diff.csb.s(s3, s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))

  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))))
  diff.csb.s(s2, s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)
  diff.cop.s(s2, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c1st, cv(s1))

  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2nd, cv(s1))
  diff.c2nd.s(s2)

  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csb.s(s3, s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)
  diff.cop.s(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))

thm fprodcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s1 ∈ `' c0, c2))
  ⊣ (s0 = < s2, s3 > → c1 = c3)
  ⊣ (s1 = < s3, s2 > → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → Rel(c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6eqr(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1), prod(s1 ∈ `' c0, c2), prod(s1 ∈ `' c0,[(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3), w0)
  fprodf1o(s0, s1, c0, c1, `' c0, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, (hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), w0)
  syl6eqr(c1, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1, s0 = <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>)
  csbeq1a(s0, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, c1)
  csbie2(s2, s3, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1), c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1)
  syl5eqr(c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1, [< s2, s3 > / s0]c1, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  csbie(s0, < s2, s3 >, c1, c3)
  opex(s2, s3)
  csbeq1d(s0, < s2, s3 >, c1, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  opeq12(s2, (2nd ` s1), s3, (1st ` s1))
  syl(w0, `' c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin)
  cnvfi(c0)
  mpbii(w0, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 ↔ c0), ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 ↔ `' `' c0))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 ↔ `' `' c0), Rel(`' c0))
  cnvf1o(hs0, `' c0)
  f1oeq3d((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), `' c0, `' `' c0, c0, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' `' c0 = c0, Rel(c0))
  dfrel2(c0)
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈ `' c0, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` s1)= <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>)
  eqtrd(((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` s1), <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>), s1 ∈ `' c0)
  fveq2d((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, s1 ∈ `' c0)
  syl(s1 ∈ `' c0, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)= <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> ∈ `' c0)
  ibi(s1 ∈ `' c0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> ∈ `' c0)
  eleq1d(s1, `' c0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, s1 ∈ `' c0)
  fvmpt(hs0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, `' c0, (hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ⋃ `' { hs0 })
  syl6eq(⋃ `' { hs0 }, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ⋃ `' { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  unieqd(`' { hs0 }, `' { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  cnveqd({ hs0 }, { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  sneq(hs0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  opswap((1st ` s1), (2nd ` s1))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }))
  opex((2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  prodeq2i(s1, `' c0, c2, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3)
  syl6eqr(c2, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, [<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, s1 ∈ `' c0)
  syl(s1 ∈ `' c0, c2 =[<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, s1 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  mpan(s1 ∈ `' c0, s1 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, Rel(`' c0))
  relcnv(c0)
  1st2nd(`' c0, s1)
  csbeq1a(s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, c2)
  csbie2(s2, s3, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1), c3, [<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2)
  fvex(c2nd, s1)
  fvex(c1st, s1)
  syl5eqr(c3, [<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, [< s3, s2 > / s1]c2, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  csbie(s1, < s3, s2 >, c2, c3)
  opex(s3, s2)
  csbeq1d(s1, < s3, s2 >, c2, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  ancoms(s2 =(2nd ` s1), s3 =(1st ` s1), < s3, s2 > = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  opeq12(s3, (1st ` s1), s2, (2nd ` s1))
  diff.csb.s(s0, s2, (2nd ` s1), [(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3)
  diff.csb.s(s0, s3, (1st ` s1), c3)
  diff.cop.s(s0, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, s1)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, s1)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, `' c0, ⋃ `' { hs0 })
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, `' { hs0 })
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, { hs0 })
  diff.csn.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  diff.csb.s(s3, s0, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, c1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  diff.cop.s(s0, s2, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.hs0.c(`' c0)

}

blocks.content: Interchange product order. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s1, c1, cprod(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fprodcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, prod(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= prod(s1 ∈ c1, prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)↔(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)))
  ancom(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
}

blocks.name: fprod0diag
blocks.content: Two ways to express "the product of ` A ( j , k ) ` over the triangular region ` M <_ j ` , ` M <_ k ` , ` j + k <_ N ` . Compare ~ fsum0diag . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprod0diag(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), cprod(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), c1)), cprod(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))), c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodcom2(s0, s1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))), w0)
  fzfid(nat0, c0, w0)
  fzfid(nat0, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))))))
  impbii(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))))))
  fsum0diaglem(s0, s1, c0)
  fsum0diaglem(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, cv(s1))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, cv(s0))
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm fprod0diag(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈(0[...]c0), prod(s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0)), c1))= prod(s1 ∈(0[...]c0), prod(s0 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s1)), c1)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0))))→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodcom2(s0, s1, (0[...]c0), (0[...](c0[-]s0)), c1, (0[...]c0), (0[...](c0[-]s1)), w0)
  fzfid(nat0, c0, w0)
  fzfid(nat0, (c0[-]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(0[...]c0)))
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0)))↔(s1 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s0 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s1)))))
  impbii((s0 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0))), (s1 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s0 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s1))))
  fsum0diaglem(s0, s1, c0)
  fsum0diaglem(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, (c0[-]s1))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, s1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, (c0[-]s0))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fproddivf
blocks.content: The quotient of two finite products. A version of ~ fproddiv using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fproddivf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cdiv, cprod(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c2, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cprod(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cdiv, cprod(s0, c0, c2)), cprod(hs0, c0, co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cdiv, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))), co(cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cdiv, cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), cprod(hs0, c0, co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cdiv, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cdiv, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfcv(hs0, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
  nfov(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cdiv, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(s0, cdiv)
  oveq12d(c1, cdiv, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fproddiv(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc))
  eleq1d(c2, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), nat0)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c2, nat0)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), nat0))
  nfan1(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfvd(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfne(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), nat0)
  nfcv(s0, nat0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c2, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), nat0))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  neeq1d(c2, nat0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq12d(cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cdiv, cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cprod(s0, c0, c1)))
  eqcomi(cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cprod(s0, c0, c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
  cbvprodi(hs0, s0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  eqcomd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  equcoms(hs0, s0, wceq(c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cdiv, c2))
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fproddivf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[÷]c2))=(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[÷]prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ≠ 0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(prod(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[÷]c2)), (prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[÷]prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), prod(hs0 ∈ c0,([hs0 / s0]c1[÷][hs0 / s0]c2)), (prod(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1)[÷]prod(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, prod(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[÷]c2))= prod(hs0 ∈ c0,([hs0 / s0]c1[÷][hs0 / s0]c2)))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, (c1[÷]c2), ([hs0 / s0]c1[÷][hs0 / s0]c2))
  nfcv(hs0, (c1[÷]c2))
  nfov(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cdiv, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(s0, cdiv)
  oveq12d(c1, cdiv, c2, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  fproddiv(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c2, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c2 ≠ 0), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ≠ 0))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 ≠ 0)
  nfan1(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfvd(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfne(s0, [hs0 / s0]c2, nat0)
  nfcv(s0, nat0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c2 ≠ 0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 ≠ 0)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  neeq1d(c2, nat0, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  oveq12d(prod(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), cdiv, prod(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c2), prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1), prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, prod(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  eqcomi(prod(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  a1i(w0, prod(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c2)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  cbvprodi(hs0, s0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c2, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  eqcomd([hs0 / s0]c2, c2, hs0 = s0)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, c2 =[hs0 / s0]c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[÷]c2))
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: fprodsplitf
blocks.content: Split a finite product into two parts. A version of ~ fprodsplit using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1)), cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), co(cprod(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cmul, cprod(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  fprodsplit(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq12i(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1), cprod(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cprod(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c2, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c3, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm fprodsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, c3), co(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, cprod(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  fprodsplitf(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, c0, csn(c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd(cun(c0, csn(c1)), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, csn(c1))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cc))
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)))
  elunnel1(cv(s0), c0, csn(c1))
  elsni(cv(s0), c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, cc))
  oveq2d(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, cprod(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, cc))
  prodsnf(s0, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

thm fprodsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2)=(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[×]c3))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(prod(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2), (prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[×]c3), (prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[×]prod(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)), w0)
  fprodsplitf(s0, (c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2, c0, { c1 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, (c0 ⋂ { c1 })= ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd((c0 ⋃ { c1 }), w0)
  sylancl(w0, (c0 ⋃ { c1 })∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin, { c1 } ∈ Fin)
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, { c1 })
  pm2.61dan((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 })), c2 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c0)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }))∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }))∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0), c2 = c3, s0 = c1)
  adantll(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), ¬ s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1)
  syl((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 })∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0), s0 = c1, s0 ∈ { c1 })
  elunnel1(s0, c0, { c1 })
  elsni(s0, c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), ¬ s0 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq2d(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2), cmul, prod(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, prod(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)= c3, c1 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  prodsnf(s0, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)

blocks.name: fprodmodd
blocks.content: If all factors of two finite products are equal modulo ` M ` , the products are equal modulo ` M ` . (Contributed by AV, 7-Jul-2021.)
